Author: Birdie49
Text: I have hobbies; I'm in school and a steady relationship. I've embraced exercise as a hobby, maybe a little too much. But I miss that obsession specifically. I enjoyed it, in a sick way. I have things to fill my time, but I still miss filling my time with that, I suppose. I hope that makes sense

Author: InterestingPush0
Text: Try to find a cause to live and a hobby. I think when you have a reason to live, you will have less of these thoughts. Because when you want to live for a reason, you don't really want to die and that's the matter. ;)  And if you find a hobby, what suits for you totally, then you'll be able to cut of the rest of the thought, what are about your missing obsession. (Because when you want to do e.g. looking for thispo, you can do another distraction and it will be truly helpful.) [I THINK AND I HOPE] Btw don't look back, and just go on YOUR way, I'm proud of you!ðŸ’–
